entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning this afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
